name: Clicker: A Clicker
description:
Hello all,

This game is, well, pretty self-explanatory. It's a basic clicker game... Um.. usually I have more to say about my games, but, once again, its very basic, but the game play is solid (at least I like to think). So yeah. In terms my personal development habits (like you would like to know), I am trying to work on a regular basis. But once again, definitely expect more from me in the future.

Until then,

RickyDiculous
